connector.description: Receive data from a RabbitMQ Broker.

camel.kamelet.rabbitmq-source.addresses.name: camel.kamelet.rabbitmq-source.addresses
camel.kamelet.rabbitmq-source.addresses.description: Comma separated list of RabbitMQ broker addresses Example: localhost:5672

camel.kamelet.rabbitmq-source.routingKey.name: camel.kamelet.rabbitmq-source.routingKey
camel.kamelet.rabbitmq-source.routingKey.description: The routing key to use when binding a consumer queue to the exchange

camel.kamelet.rabbitmq-source.username.name: camel.kamelet.rabbitmq-source.username
camel.kamelet.rabbitmq-source.username.description: The username to access the RabbitMQ server

camel.kamelet.rabbitmq-source.password.name: camel.kamelet.rabbitmq-source.password
camel.kamelet.rabbitmq-source.password.description: The password to access the RabbitMQ server

camel.kamelet.rabbitmq-source.exchangeNa.name: camel.kamelet.rabbitmq-source.exchangeName
camel.kamelet.rabbitmq-source.exchangeNa.description: The exchange name determines the exchange the queue will be bound to

camel.kamelet.rabbitmq-source.queue.name: camel.kamelet.rabbitmq-source.queue
camel.kamelet.rabbitmq-source.queue.description: The queue to receive messages from
